|brand = Xiaomi |model = Mi |submodelappend = yes |submodel = AX3600 (M60) |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 08/29/2020 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/Xiaomi_Mi_AX3600 |wlclass = AX3000 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = 2AIMR |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = H92504PN062A1 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ8071A; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- 1.0 GHz (+ NPU @1.5GHz) --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W29N02GZSIBA; |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = EtronTech;EM6HE16EWAKG-10H; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8075; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 3 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 5C:53:C3 |oui = 5C:53:C3
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;4.4.60;;
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wi-Fi 6, MU-MIMO, DBDC, OFDMA, IoT, heatsink, |addchip = 2.4GHz WLAN RF FEM;Qorvo;QPF4288;;2; ,,, 5GHz WLAN RF FEM;Qorvo;QPF4588;;4; ,,, 2.4/5GHz WLAN IoT Chip;Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9889;;1; ,,, 2.4GHz WLAN RF LNA;NXP;BGU7224;;1; ,,, 5GHz WLAN RF LNA;NXP;BGU7258;;1; ,,, PMIC;Qualcomm;PMP8074;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ax
|defaulip = 192.168.31.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = Xiaomi_XXXX,Xiaomi_XXXX_5G |defaultssid_regex = ^Xiaomi_[A-F0-9]{4}$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 03/2020 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm;QCN5024; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n/ax |axqam1 = <!-- AX-qam --> |rad1ax = 574 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm;QCN5054; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |axqam2 = <!-- AX-qam --> |rad2ax = 2402 |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = 1733 |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
